name: Dwarven Battle Training
description:
Deal increased strike damage to weakened foes. Disabling a foe applies weakness.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, taunt, and launch.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.
